turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I was wondering if I can get four pizzas

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure from where?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: papa johns.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And where will it be delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: To the conference office on the 3rd floor.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds great what do you want on your pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: For the first pizza I would like to be all cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Size of the pizzia?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: They will all be large

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and for the next pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The other one will just pepperoni and cheese

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And for the third pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Get a Garden Fresh pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and for the last one?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hawaiian Chicken

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So we have four large pizzas that are as follow: Hawaiian Chicken, Garden Fresh, pepperoni and cheese?, and just cheese.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you want to order some drinks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ya that will be great order 2 sprites and 2 cokes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great if that is all it should be ready for pickup in about 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great and can you make sure I can get a recipe for that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes I will text it to your phone

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That will be fine, good bye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Good bye sir.
